name: EGG DROP
description:
Wanna support EGG DROP? Wanna get some costumes? Download EGG DROP Steam edition!

BATTLE ROYALE ACTION

Be the last hen standing in the world's first all-female (nonhuman) Battle Royale!

ESCAPE THE EGG BULLET HELL

Survive hundreds of eggs as they're rained down on you from above!

DOOM YOUR OPPONENTS TO AN EGGY FATE

Collect corn and powerups to help you produce your own eggs to send to the unlucky souls below!

EGG DROP? MORE LIKE EGG DRIP

After winning so many games, show off your costumes to the lesser fowl

Join the EGGTAD discord!!! https://discord.com/invite/dsNAkTx
